title: Vlad Reunite
itunes:title: Vlad Reunite
description:
Today on the show we had DJ Vlad call in where he spoke about controversial content, Joe Budden, Nick Cannon, and new partnership with iHeart. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to an Oregan man who stole a car and hit a stolen car and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
